

.. _file_applyspecmodule.cpp:

File applyspecmodule.cpp
========================================================================================



Contains the module for python integration for additional applying speciation rates after a simulation is completed. 


.. contents:: Contents
   :local:
   :backlinks: none

Definition (``applyspecmodule.cpp``)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   program_listing_file_applyspecmodule.cpp.rst



Detailed Description
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Samuel Thompson 
01/08/2017
1.0 
BSD-3 Licence. For use on the SQL database outputs of NECSim v3.1+. It requires command line parameters and generates a data object from them. Contact: samuel.thompson14@imperial.ac.uk or thompsonsed@gmail.com
